name: Vileplume
author: Kagemaru Himeno
flavor_text: Its petals are the largest in the world. As it walks, it scatters extremely allergenic pollen.

poke_power.name: Energy Reaction
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), when you attach a {G} or {P} Energy card from your hand to Vileplume (excluding effects of attacks or Poké-Powers), you may use this power. If you attach a {G} Energy card, the Defending Pokémon is now Asleep. If you attach a {P} Energy card, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned. This power can’t be used if Vileplume is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Disturbing Pollen
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent can’t play any Trainer, Supporter, or Stadium cards from his or her hand during your opponent’s next turn.
